ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Hot Key to Re-target Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: Because I keep my left hand on the 1-6 hotkeys, I have remapped my target self/pet key to F7. Now I can easily: target mob 1 hotkey 1(charm) F8 hotkey 4 (pet
ygData.messageBody:
Because I keep my left hand on the 1-6 hotkeys, I have remapped my target
self/pet key to F7.

Now I can easily:

target mob 1
hotkey 1(charm)
F8
hotkey 4 (pet attack(as below))
F7,F7 (retarget pet)
twist two songs (selo's (hotkey 2) or heal (hotkey 3))

without moving either hand.

Tomerrilin

-----Original Message-----
From: blitz_krieg@... [mailto:blitz_krieg@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 12:46 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Hot Key to Re-target Pet

Then I F1 twice, play heal song, and try to time the recharm
exactly. :)

To be able to program the F1/F1 would be tremendous, as in hectic
situations I sometimes end up recharming the wrong mob. Pets (or
tanks or nukers for that matter) don't seem to like that much. :)
